AccountId.description: The unique identifier for the account

TimePeriod.description: The time period covered by the report data

CampaignId.description: The unique identifier for the campaign

AdGroupName.description: The name of the ad group

AdGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the ad group

Country.description: The country where the ad is displayed

State.description: The state where the ad is displayed

MetroArea.description: The metropolitan area where the ad is displayed

CurrencyCode.description: The currency code used in the report

AdDistribution.description: The distribution network of the ad

AveragePosition.description: The average position where the ad is displayed

Language.description: The language setting of the user

City.description: The city where the ad is displayed

QueryIntentDMA.description: The query intent Designated Market Area

BidMatchType.description: The match type of the bid

DeliveredMatchType.description: The match type of the delivered item

Network.description: The network where the ad is displayed

TopVsOther.description: Indicates if the ad is shown at the top or other positions

DeviceType.description: The type of device where the ad is displayed

DeviceOS.description: The operating system of the device

Assists.description: The number of assists in conversions

CostPerAssist.description: The cost per assist in conversions

RevenuePerAssist.description: The revenue per assist in conversions

County.description: The county where the ad is displayed

PostalCode.description: The postal code of the location

LocationId.description: The unique identifier for the location

AllConversions.description: The total number of all conversions

AllRevenue.description: The total revenue for all conversions

AllConversionRate.description: The conversion rate for all conversions

AllCostPerConversion.description: The cost per conversion for all conversions

AllReturnOnAdSpend.description: The return on ad spend for all conversions

AllRevenuePerConversion.description: The revenue per conversion for all conversions

ViewThroughConversions.description: The number of conversions where the ad was displayed but not clicked

Goal.description: The goal associated with the report data

GoalType.description: The type of goal associated with the report data

AbsoluteTopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of impressions shown at the absolute top of the page

TopImpressionRatePercent.description: The percentage of impressions shown at the top position

AverageCpm.description: The average cost per thousand impressions

ViewThroughConversionsQualified.description: The number of qualified view-through conversions

Neighborhood.description: The neighborhood where the ad is displayed

ViewThroughRevenue.description: The revenue generated from view-through conversions

AssetGroupId.description: The unique identifier for the asset group

AssetGroupName.description: The name of the asset group
